name: No More Spase in Space
description:
Game made for Ludum Dare 42  (11-12 August 2018) 

Theme :  Running out of space.

This "game" was made in compo conditions 

(solo, 48h and all assets created during the GJ)

Game Jam page of the game

  

 

 Info   :   The end  of the game occurs between  1000  and  1500

 

 

 Known bug: 

  • Invisible green bonus (if you hear unexpected "bong", you hit one of it)

A corrected version is available here!
